sourcesContent:
I have a good understanding of how the web works, including concepts such as HTTP, APIs, and server-side programming. I've also worked with databases like MySQL and I'm familiar with Git for version control.
I'm excited to continue to learn and grow as a web developer, and I'm always looking for new opportunities to expand my skills and knowledge.
